Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Southbound Reroute near Van Buren/Clark
ShortDescription: SB 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Clark, Harrison due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Clark and Harrison due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Clark.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 89th/Commercial
